Package org.springdata.cassandra.cql.option

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Option
    Interface to represent option types.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultOption
    A default implementation of Option.
    KeyspaceOptions
    Keyspace Options Creator
    KeyspaceReplicationOptions
    Keyspace Replication Options Builder
    OptionsCreator<O extends Option,T extends OptionsCreator<O,T>>
    Options builder
    TableOptions
    Table Options Creator
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    KeyspaceOption
    Enumeration that represents all known keyspace options.
    KeyspaceOption.ReplicationOption
    Known replication options.
    TableOption
    Enumeration that represents all known table options.
    TableOption.CachingOption
    Known caching options.
    TableOption.CompactionOption
    Known compaction options.
    TableOption.CompressionOption
    Known compression options.
